name: Queen of Cups
upright_love_meaning: caring and supportive nature brings suitors
upright_career_meaning: taking the role of carer at work
seeking out support and compassion at work
upright_finances_meaning: using resources to care for others
reverse_love_meaning: putting more effort in than partner
reverse_career_meaning: neglecting your own emotional health for job
reverse_finances_meaning: neglecting own financial health for others
